front.title: Multi-path Label Switched Paths Signaled Using RSVP-TE

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to Resource ReSerVation Protocol - Traffic Engineering for the set up of multi-path Traffic Engineered Label Switched Paths (LSPs) in Multi Protocol Label Switching and Generalized MPLS networks, i.e., LSPs that conform to traffic engineering constraints, but follow multiple independent paths from the source to the destination that allow load balancing.
